parameters: The shed door is locked in order to prevent forest animals from making their way inside.
The shed door is locked in order to prevent forest animals from making their way inside.
A large pair of garden shears are buried in the ground.
These shears are usually used for trimming vines and trees that overstay their welcome.
For some reason, the shears are covered in various dents.
Children and large scissors usually don't mix.
